title: An Elegant Countryside Escape with Decadent Dining and Whisky Tasting
description: Immerse yourself in Ireland's idyllic countryside with a stay at Sheen Falls Lodge, a five-star Relais & Ch√¢teax estate boasting award-winning dining, a luxurious spa, ornate rooms and suites, as well as easy access to all that this spectacular area has to offer. Hire a car and explore the town of Kenmare and beyond, before returning to your beautiful hotel, where you will enjoy daily breakfast and dinner at The Falls Restaurant, an authentic Irish whisky tasting, a welcome gift of local artisanal chocolates and more.
offer_address: Sheen Falls Lodge, Kenmare Old, Kenmare, Co. Kerry, V93 HR27, Ireland
